title: Spicy Burger
text: It’s no surprise that burgers are among millennials’ top choices when choosing to eat at a quick service establishment. For some, it even brings back sentimental childhood memories.

title: Egg Half Fry
text: For a person who is looking out for a healthy, filling, nutritious, and easy to prepare breakfast, fried egg recipe is on top of the list. For a person with a busy schedule rushing to the office early morning, it can be the quick bite of choice

title: Pizza
text: Whether it's as a fuss-free dinner meal, or as a snack to chase down with your gulps of beer, pizza has rescued us from hunger pangs in more ways than one can count

title: Fried Chicken
text: Fried Chicken. Crunchy, juicy fried battered chicken. A delicious, indulgent way to have chicken. Perfect with some beer!
